about.title: Professional Logistics
about.description: As Modern Sea Live, we are leaders in the global freight forwarding sector with FCL and LCL container shipping, multimodal transport solutions, and comprehensive customs clearance services.

feature1.title: Global Network
feature1.description: We provide seamless freight forwarding operations with our worldwide network of shipping lines and logistics partners.

feature2.title: Expert Team
feature2.description: With our experienced freight forwarders team, we professionally manage your Bill of Lading, MAWB, and TIR documentation processes.

feature3.title: Technology
feature3.description: We provide shipment visibility and operational efficiency with advanced tracking systems and digital freight management platforms.

services.title: Comprehensive Logistics
services.description: Professional freight forwarding services across all transportation modes with comprehensive supply chain management and customs clearance expertise.

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.description: FCL and LCL container shipping, Bill of Lading preparation and port handling services.

airFreight.title: Air Freight
airFreight.description: Express air cargo, MAWB preparation and fast customs clearance solutions.

roadFreight.title: Road Freight
roadFreight.description: Cross-border transport, TIR carnet and Europe-Asia overland transportation.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.description: Bonded warehouse, cargo consolidation and distribution center management.

cta.title: Tailored Freight Solutions
cta.description: Every shipment is unique. Our freight forwarding experts design customized logistics solutions that meet your specific requirements.
